prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Synth Lead, Brass, Bass, Guitar, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Brass, Bass, Guitar, and a Synth Lead, but no Piano.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Brass, Bass, Guitar, and a Synth Lead, omitting Piano.

Style 3:
This song has Drums, Brass, Bass, Guitar, and a Synth Lead, Piano not included.
